properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 6 at 1:54PM AKST until February 8 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills
will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed
skin. Expect wind chills as cold as 55 below zero.

* WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley.

* WHEN...Midnight Friday to 6 AM Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to drop tonight
and winds increase, causing very cold wind chills after
midnight.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY
